title: Leading automotive manufacturing countries in Europe 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production volume in thousand units on the Y-axis for 10 different Countrys for 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, Total had the highest Production volume in thousand units for Country Germany and Commercial Vehicles had the lowest Production volume in thousand units for Country Slovakia.
Country Spain and Slovakia had the biggest gap of 635574.0 between the highest and lowest Production volume in thousand units found for Commercial Vehicles.

On average, the Country Germany had the highest Production volume in thousand units for all 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total. Whereas Romania had the lowest average Production volume in thousand units.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Countrys on X-axis for 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Production volume in thousand units.

Country Germany had the maximum Production volume in thousand units among all 3 groups, and it was for Total. The minimum Production volume in thousand units was observed in Country Slovakia for Commercial Vehicles.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production volume in thousand units on the Y-axis for 10 different Countrys for 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, Total had the highest Production volume in thousand units for Country Germany and Commercial Vehicles had the lowest Production volume in thousand units for Country Slovakia.
Country Spain and Slovakia had the biggest gap of 635574.0 between the highest and lowest Production volume in thousand units found for Commercial Vehicles.

On average, the Country Germany had the highest Production volume in thousand units for all 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total. Whereas Romania had the lowest average Production volume in thousand units.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production volume in thousand units on the Y-axis for 10 different Countrys for 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total that are presented on the X-axis.

For Country Germany, Total had the highest Production volume in thousand units 6150839.0 among the 3 groups and in Slovakia, Commercial Vehicles had the lowest Production volume in thousand units 0.0.
Among all the Countrys, Commercial Vehicles had the highest Production volume in thousand units 635574.0 in Country Spain and lowest value 0.0 in Country Slovakia.
Country Spain and Slovakia had the biggest gap of 635574.0 between the highest and lowest Production volume in thousand units found for Commercial Vehicles.
Among all 3 groups, Passenger Cars had the gap of 5280927.0 between the maximum and minimum Production volume in thousand units observed in Country Germany and Romania respectively.

In case of Country Germany, Total had the highest Production volume in thousand units 6150839.0 among the 3 groups and in Slovakia, Commercial Vehicles had the lowest Production volume in thousand units 0.0. The second highest Production volume in thousand units 5645581.0 was observed for Total in Country Germany.

Averaging all 3 groups Passenger Cars, Commercial Vehicles, and Total, the Country Germany is the maximum Production volume in thousand units and Romania is the minimum Production volume in thousand units.
